title: Two Zn sources (ZnO nanoparticles and ZnSO4) differentially affect lipid metabolism via ferroptosis pathway and SLC7A11K23 acetylation by HDAC8 and HDAC6 in a freshwater teleost
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00239C, Paper
Yichuang Xu, Zheng Hua, Xiaoying Tan, Christer Hogstrand, Tao Zhao, Xiaolei Wei, Zhi Luo
It was very important to understand the toxicity and hazard of various metal sources which provided new insights for their risk evaluation in the environment. At present, few studies were...
